description: A frontend HTML page that provides a database viewer interface with database and table selection, data display, and UI interactivity.
external_files: CSS styles embedded within the HTML

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases from the server and displays them in the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list, resets selections, and updates the UI.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Toggles expansion of a database to show its tables and loads tables if expanded.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches tables for a specific database and displays them.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches data for a specific table within a database and renders it in a table format.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Generates HTML for displaying data in a table with support for wide content and JSON objects.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Generates HTML for individual cell content, handling different data types including objects and long strings.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses a cell to show full content or truncated preview.
